definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: bruise (NH id., Aram. [[שׁוּף]], [[שְׁפַף]], 4oq rub off, away, grind (Ex 32:20 Targum Vulgate for [[טָחַן]]); v. esp. Dr:Gn; > Di al. think ‖ form of I. [[שׁאף]]);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. + 2 ms. [[הוּא יְשׁוּפְךָ]] [[ראׁשׁ וְּאַתָּה תְּשׁוּפֶנּוּ עָקֵב]] Ge 3:15; [[אֲשֶׁר־בִּשְׂעָרָה יְשׁוּפֵנִי]] Job 9:17; [[אַךְ השֶׁךְ יְשׁוּפֵנִי]] Ps 139:11 mng. unsuitable, read perh. c. Ew al. [[יְשׂוּבֵּנִי]] cover, screen, me.
